@notice Returns the balance of a user in the contract
 @param user The address of a user

@notice The owner of the contract sets the value of the subscription
 @param _sizeOfSubscription value of the subscription
@notice Subscribes the user that made the call

@notice Checks if subscription has expire
 @param user the address of a user

@notice Returns the balance of a user in the contract
 @param user The address of a user

@notice The owner of the contract sets the value of the subscription
 @param _sizeOfSubscription value of the subscription
@notice Subscribes the user that made the call

@notice Checks if subscription has expire
 @param user the address of a user

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

balanceOf(address).notice: Returns the balance of a user in the contract

deposit(uint256).notice: Updates if subscription has expired, calls subscribe if user is not subscribe and transfer the tokens from user to the contract

setSizeOfSubscription(uint256).notice: The owner of the contract sets the value of the subscription

subscribe().notice: Subscribes the user that made the call

updateSubscription(address).notice: If subscription has expire and user has money updates his subscription, otherwise makes his subscription status false
